website_summaries.verdict: An oversize 62" umbrella that's not just for golfers, although it is one of the best for staying cool and dry on the golf course.
pros: Opens with the press of a button
Shaft is made of durable fiberglass
cons: A few users have complained that the umbrella leaks in heavy rain

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella! Sturdy and the biggest one that I have ever seen. The fiberglass pole is very strong, but is very slippery if any pressure is exerted on the umbrella in closed position....it slides very easily. It has no rubber tip to prevent it from sliding away when attempting to lean it on any other wall or support..... say a counter in a store....it will slide out flat on the floor. It must be kept in a gripped hand. Absolutely cannot be used as a cane.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my whole family dry, including me.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great umbrella. I have 3 little daughters and have been using either a hello Kitty or Minnie mouse umbrella for the last 3 years. Finally got myself grown-up one. Certainly covers a while lot more. My entire family in fact. Amazing things.
customer_reviews.author: dan orlovsky

customer_reviews.title: and really comfortable to hold
customer_reviews.text: This is a steal for the price. The umbrella is really large (like all golf umbrellas), lightweight, and really comfortable to hold. Most importantly for me, it holds up well in windy weather. I have walked my dog in numerous storms where the wind was fairly strong and previous umbrellas would have flipped, but not this one.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew F.

customer_reviews.title: Very grateful umbrella
customer_reviews.text: So far this product has told up to its word. But I can't really say much, because I haven't been out with this umbrella in any challenging rain or winds. But for the most part it's a very good umbrella for average day rain. And it humongous. I also like the sleeve that comes with it. And the grip on the handle. With this grip on the handle you know that the umbrella will stay secure in your hands. In other words, this umbrella is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: jayvone

customer_reviews.title: Good quality large umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift and I don't know that it's been used yet. It was packaged well and I can confirm that it is HUGE and appeared to be good quality. I was not using it, obviously, but I did have to lug it around and I didn't think it was too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: tdg119

customer_reviews.title: Needless to say it works great and yes I witnessed 2 other high end "golf" ...
customer_reviews.text: So, we used and are still using this as Harvey came ashore and the weather and wind continues. Needless to say it works great and yes I witnessed 2 other high end "golf" umbrellas collapsing in the gusts. This thing held its own.
customer_reviews.author: Stella B

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: My only concern to date about this umbrella was the tall skinny box in which it came. Until I opened that box, I had serious concerns about the meaning of "golf umbrella". I'd say the umbrella itself was a third to a half the height of the box. I've had it, the umbrella, not the box, about a month now and I am happy. It opens easily and closes the same way. Not that I want anyone without an umbrella like this one to get soaked, but I cannot wait for the first serious rain so this puppy will get a real test.
customer_reviews.author: Fensic

customer_reviews.title: one of the reinforcements fell off and the inside mesh seems unnecessary. the mesh just collects water and drips it ...
customer_reviews.text: in the first week, one of the reinforcements fell off and the inside mesh seems unnecessary. the mesh just collects water and drips it onto you. it gets 3-stars bc it does hold up against the wind as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Umbrella for Golf or For Two
customer_reviews.text: This large 62-inch umbrella is exactly what I was looking for - something large enough that would allow two people under it if needed, a comfortable, sticky rubber grip, and sturdy construction that wouldn't allow the umbrella to flip inside out. It will NOT flip inside out, so make sure that you are holding on TIGHT if it's windy outside. Great product, and would recommend to anyone looking for a large umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I haven't used it much as I just ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I haven't used it much as I just received it. But it arrived it good condition. It creates a large canopy which I like and is easy to use. We will see how it holds up in inclement weather.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella, I was at my sons football game ...
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella, I was at my sons football game and the rain was coming sideways, its big enough to keep the wife and I both dry, also holds up well against the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I honestly haven’t had a chance to use the Umbrella ...
customer_reviews.text: I honestly haven’t had a chance to use the Umbrella yet, but it is a very heavy duty umbrella! It definitely looks to withstand rain w/ wind!
customer_reviews.author: SWaltman

customer_reviews.title: worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid umbrella, i would recommend it especially to busy moms on the go
customer_reviews.author: JoyD

customer_reviews.title: I like this umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I like this umbrella. It is great size, resistant to wind and comfortable to use. It would be nice if it was a bit lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love the size. Well covers two people under the canopy. The fact that this does not flip over in heavy wind is an excellent thing.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Arrived late AND was torn. That sure makes for a pretty useless umbrella.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it because it had so many good reviews. Short and sweet - arrived late, AND was torn (literally falling apart at the seams). No thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Newsom

customer_reviews.title: Defender of rain
customer_reviews.text: Protects from rain, and is big enough for two people.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Appreciative Field Engineer
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Nice grip. I look forward to years of service from this Umbrella. I am not a Golfer (too hard - I SCUBA Dive). Make a living being a Field Engineer. I take a Total Station, a Data Collector, and a set of structural drawings out to the site, then lay out the building. It rains on me sometimes...but now I have a decent umbrella. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: PGLOUD

customer_reviews.title: Everything was Wonderful. Products is exactly as I expected
customer_reviews.text: Everything was Wonderful. Products is exactly as I expected, arrived just as expected. Very pleased, will definitely do business again.
customer_reviews.author: tdkkenned

customer_reviews.title: Great Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd umbrella and they are fantastic. Durable, effective and reasonably priced. I keep one in the car and one in the golf bag.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: but seems to be of good quality. Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used umbrella yet, but seems to be of good quality. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bob K

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Constructed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my daughter-in-law for Christmas. She loves it! Excellent construction and perfect to bring along for all their sports activities. Will buy one for myself in the near future!
customer_reviews.author: Stacidonnette

customer_reviews.title: Old man with a view
customer_reviews.text: This product appears to be well made. Perfect size for the golf course. Delivery of the product was also very timely.
customer_reviews.author: old man with a view

customer_reviews.title: Excellent golf umbrella
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought this umbrella, and she can't rave enough about it. The price was right, it's very sturdy & held up in a torrential downpour less than a week after purchase! She's very pleased and recommends this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Yost

customer_reviews.title: This umbrella is the best. I'm sure it will keep me dry
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is the best. I'm sure it will keep me dry. But until we get some rain I will not know. I will post again when that is a reality. Wish I could send a bunch to the folks in Texas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be well made. No complaints. Got it to keep on my golf bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.

customer_reviews.title: You Should Buy One, Too
customer_reviews.text: This the golf umbrella I've been wanting. Lifetime warranty, too. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Well constructed. Sadly, or fortunately depending on your perspective, I used the umbrella for the first time today on the golf course. It withstood winds and a heavy downpour. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Quattrini

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: An excellent product, quality construction. Works beautifully in the wind. Overall, good value. So easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer Al

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is a great umbrella. Easy to open and use. Well built and excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one month
customer_reviews.text: At first, this umbrella seems great. Very nice size, a little bit heavy, but gets the job done. After one month, the umbrella is already broken. Each piece of the umbrella is only attached by a small string and mine happened to break almost immediately. See picture attached.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dry head!
customer_reviews.text: I have it comfortable to use alone or with someone for rain and sun.
customer_reviews.author: Abel Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic umbrella. It's sturdy, it's big, it keeps us dry!
customer_reviews.author: Todd A. Hooper

customer_reviews.title: Really good umbrella. We gave one as a gift and ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Really good umbrella. We gave one as a gift and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: PickyConsumer

customer_reviews.title: This umbrella is amazing it's big enough to cover me and a friend
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is amazing it's big enough to cover me and a friend. Very well made excellent quality, bulit to last, best umbrella you will ever buy!
customer_reviews.author: Deven Fields

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great for sunny days watching my granddaughters play tennis. Also works well in rain--nice coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. Her old umbrella would take her walking cart into the sand trap
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It worked well during a very cold & rainy day of soccer!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: High quality and strong
customer_reviews.text: High quality and strong umbrella. It works well in the umbrella holder on my push cart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: RECOMMENDED!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy open/close mechanism and rods are of high quality and strong! I'm very interested to see if rain comes in the vents.
customer_reviews.author: MistressPemberley

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella and exceptional company
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella!! This company provided exceptional service and has an outstanding product. The perfect father's day gift for my husband - he loves this umbrella!!
customer_reviews.author: tricolorhound

customer_reviews.title: Strong enough for hurricane
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, used it during the winds of Hurricane Matthew, and it didn't fail me.
customer_reviews.author: CaptQuay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy construction and smooth mechanics. Very happy with it the few times I've used it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied so far
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied so far. It is very large (which is exactly what I wanted), sturdy and well made. Haven't had a chance to test it in strong winds yet, but it beautifully protects from heavy rain. It also looks very good.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Weymann

customer_reviews.title: Great item -Material could be thicker
customer_reviews.text: I thought the umbrella could be a little bit more stronger and that the material could be more thicker. It opened very well and the handle felt great especially with the automatic opener however I would've liked the material just a little bit more thicker
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Vandergriff

customer_reviews.title: This umbrella looks very well made. I haven't had ...
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella looks very well made. I haven't had to use yet but the day will probably happen this weekend. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and does what it was intended to do. Light weight yet strong on windy days.
customer_reviews.author: Principal Bob

customer_reviews.title: Durability issue
customer_reviews.text: One of the fiberglass struts broke on the first day of use. On the positive side the umbrella remained usable although it sagged on one side.
customer_reviews.author: Randy B.

customer_reviews.title: Boy this is the best!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in a drought, it finally rained and sure glad I had it.. This umbrella is top shelf and would recommend it to anyone..
customer_reviews.author: J C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well built and it kept me nice and dry while playing 3 times this last month.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff in Washington

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice size and easy to open and close. Worked great at our rainy golf tournament!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Casteel

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and appreciate the venting
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sturdy and appreciate the venting especially for hot weather at soccer games.
customer_reviews.author: Heather A Gibson

customer_reviews.title: A bit on the heavy side
customer_reviews.text: A bit on the heavy side. Not as light as I expected compared to the last umbrella I had.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ton

customer_reviews.title: I heard they love it.
customer_reviews.text: Sent it out for a gift, never got to use it. I heard they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and quick delivery. Works great and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S Crouthamel

customer_reviews.title: Great Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality umbrella with excellent customer service. Can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Chuckwagon

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage. Hasn't turned inside out even in strong wind
customer_reviews.author: Linda Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quick haven't used it yet but seems sturdy and should do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Barclay Day

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have had a lot of golf size umbrellas. This one has the beef to hold up under pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen D. Raich

customer_reviews.title: broken
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella arrived in a damaged box and the umbrella itself was damaged. Even without the damage to the box, I don't feel like quality was there to make this a smart buy. The quality doesn't seem to be there. Due to it's irregular shape and size, no box available to return product nor was one offered for return.
customer_reviews.author: miss.piggy

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used 3 times and the umbrella broke. Not worth purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald F. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Well-made and does what it's suppose to ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Well-made and does what it's suppose to do.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: The umbrella is not what was advertised. The description ...
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella is not what was advertised. The description is a 62 inch Large umbrella... However, it is only 53" measured from tip to tip. Why would anyone measure the arch of the umbrella as the size??? Isn't the diameter the logical measurement? Had the umbrella been described as measured by the arch..I would not have bought this umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

product_meta.title: Procella Large Golf Umbrella – Award Winning, Windproof, Waterproof - Superior Heavy Duty Automatic Umbrella Defies High Wind, Sun & Rain – Perfect Cart Holder Fit – Matching Carrying Case Sleeve
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :39 x 2 x 2 inches; 1.5 Pounds
 * Item model number :FBA_Golf Umbrella 62
 * Date First Available :December 30, 2013
 * Manufacturer :Procella
 * ASIN :B00HLG9QPG

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #16,090 in Sports & Outdoors (See Top 100 in Sports & Outdoors)  *  #22 inGolf Umbrellas 
    *  #7 inSports Fan Golf Umbrellas 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.5 out of 5 stars2,192 ratings
feature_bullets: JUST KEEPS WINNING AWARDS! OVER 100,000+ GOLFERS AGREE, this large umbrella boasts the sleek style, brilliant convenience and powerful features you’re looking for in a windproof umbrella, from a TRUSTED COMPANY that values your relationship and guarantees your 100% SATISFACTION. [Recent awards included “BEST IN TEST” Golf Review & BEST OF THE BEST Chicago Tribune Buyers Guide].

☂️ STAY DRY – VIRTUALLY UNBREAKABLE: DON’T LET UNEXPECTED weather challenges ruin a perfectly lovely game of golf. With a REINFORCE FIBERGLASS FRAME, Tear-Resistant INNER MESH & VENTED Double Canopy Construction, this WINDPROOF, WEATHERPROOF, WATERPROOF UMBRELLA is PROVEN to defy rain, snow and winds up to 46MPH.

☂️ STAY COOL – INSTANT SHADE: Superior fabric mitigates the suns harsh rays, creating a cooling Oasis for you and your golf partner before tucking away into its 38.7 inch sleeve, fitting neatly into your trunk to keep you cool at your next FAMILY EVENT, SPORTS GAME or DAY AT THE BEACH.

☂️ AUTO OPEN – PINCH FREE CLOSE: GLIDES OPEN like a swan on the lake with a simple push of the spring-loaded button, then gently slides closed without putting your fingers at risk. The ultimate golf umbrella for women and men who prefer cutting-edge quality and comfort, WITHOUT WASTING SPACE in your GOLF BAG.

☂️ ULTRA-LIGHTWEIGHT (1.7LBS) - PERFECTLY FITS YOUR GOLF CART UMBRELLA HOLDER: At the weight of an extra putter set, the ERGONOMIC ANTI-SLIP umbrella handle stays securely placed in your WET HAND or golf cart umbrella holder, so while other golfers wear down their grip, you’ll still maintain your “A” game thru the 18th hole. Put it thru the paces for a full YEAR and love it or let us know and we’ll do what it takes to make it right.
